thread.title_full: Best Place To Stay In Rome - Review of Barocco Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: girliegirl42
title: Best Place To Stay In Rome
text: My son and I stayed at the Barocco Hotel for 5 nights. The hotel is very clean , our deluxe room with king sized bed and windows and terrace facing the plaza fountain and busy streets just below us. Centrally located you are steps away from shopping , dining , and points of interest . The staff are welcoming and very courteous . Seeing smiling faces, beautiful rooms, full breakfast buffet every morning . This Hotel delivers . Would definitely book here on my next trip to Rome, Italy.
